name: Trade+ 3.71 - Display levels received from xp offer
body:
# Trade+ 3.71

The experience points trading seems to be a bit confusing, so I have added a new placeholder %LEVELS% for the extras.experience.theiroffer config option.

It will say for example "Their experience points offer is 100 (+6 levels)"

Hopefully this is a nicer experience. Please give me your feedback in a private message if you have any ideas to improve Trade+

## Also included in this release is Trade+ version 3.70: Add VotingPlugin points support

This update adds support for VotingPlugin so you can trade the vote points you earn.

name: Trade+ 3.69 - New config options to disable the spectator command and the broadcast. Also fixed griefprevention not saving the changes after a trade if the player quits immediately
body: New config options to disable the spectator command and the broadcast. Also fixed griefprevention not saving the changes after a trade if the player quits immediately.

name: Trade+ 3.68.2 - Fix worldguard error
body: Catches the NoClassDefFoundError if worldguard isn't installed. This fixes an error some people were experiencing with the latest update.

name: Trade+ 3.68.1 - Fix 1.7.10 compatibility
body: I broke 1.7.10 compatibility on accident while updating a library. It's fixed now

name: Fix xp dupe, excess chest, other features
body:
- Experience duplication is no longer possible as I have disabled the 'levelMode' option in the config. The way Minecraft's code works with levels and xp is hard to manage and I can't get it to work. I may revisit this later.

- Negative extra amounts can't be entered into chat / anvil now.

- Blocked items can't be shift-clicked into the trade inventory now.

- %EXTRA% can be used in the extras.type category in your config file to show the name of the extra being traded, i.e. experience / money / grief prevention points. Each extra's name can be modified at their respective config sections.

Excess Chest

Ever had your items fall because you didn't have any inventory space? Now, you don't need to worry about it, as you'll have a handy chest open up at the end of the trade with extra items which couldn't fit!

The player can re-organize their inventory and take the items, then close the inventory and let the remainder fall to the ground. This new feature can be disabled with the config option "excess-chest.enabled" set to false. You can also change the title of excess chest.

Worldguard Flag

Now, you can set the "trading" flag to true or false to control trading in regions of your world using WorldGuard.

For example, if you only want trading allowed in spawn, you can first set trading to false in the __global__ region which encompasses the entire world outside other defined regions. Then, set trading to true in your region!

If you have WorldGuard on your server, you should see the trading flag available in the /region flag command. By default, it's set to true in all regions.

Fixes

There was an error displaying the extra's internal ids (economy instead of money, for example). This is fixed now.

name: Trade+ 3.61 - Update to 1.15
body: Brings github releases up to date with spigot releases and tested with 1.15

name: Trade+ 3.58 - Fix 1.7.10 support and weird teleporting during chat entering
body:
I made the code check if the server is 1.7.10 and if it is, avoids certain API features that aren't available to the most outdated versions. Should fix 1.7.10 support.
Also made it smoother to keep player from moving during trade

name: Disable anvil, fix errors
body:
Disabled anvil input because it's too much of a pain to make work, especially across versions. Chat will now be used if you had it set to anvil. 

Also fixed an error related to chat input and fixed a math issue in the chat input code.

name: Fixes and updates
body:
Added:
- Few extra checks to keep the anvil gui or anything else from opening the trade menu after the trade has ended
- XP levels option at extras.experience.levelMode (set to true to use levels instead of XP)

Fixed:
- Inconsistent behavior with the anvil gui in early versions, switched back to another library for the GUI which is a lot better. 
- Occasional XP error during trade end
- /trade command logic
- Maximum distance message displays wrong number
- XP math issues
- Anvil GUI library updates
- Material issues in 1.7.10
- Other small things I found while testing

name: Fix anvil maximum message and 1.8 compatibility with anvil gui
body:
- Fix %BALANCE% displaying in the anvil maximum balance message.
- Remove AnvilPrepareEvent listener (fixes 1.8 compatibility)

name: Async loading, anvil input
body:
Anvil input is back!
The "mode" option for extras now support three choices:
- "anvil"
- "chat"
- "increment"

Also made the plugin load the configuration files async as well as loading new trades async for server performance.

name: Same IP address check, factions support, exploit patch
body:
**3.46**
Added two new config options:
- allow-same-ip-trade Defines whether to allow trading between two players on the same IP address. Also added errors.same-ip to lang.yml to correspond with this
- hooks.factions.allow-trades-in-enemy-territory Whether to allow trading in enemy faction territory. Denial message is at hooks.factions.enemy-territory

Fixed:
- Trade logs not being saved

**3.47**
I patched an exploit with the new input method and fixed the logging error.

Also removed a debug message that was left in during testing for a previous update (Sorry)

name: Chat input for extras
body:
Hello everyone! I was notified of an issue with the recently added anvil gui input. Players were being charged the XP cost listed on the GUI.

Since I was using someone else's library for the anvil gui, I can't just fix the problem. I would need to dive in and figure out how it works before I can fix it which would kind of defeat the purpose of using someone else's, or just create my own.

So, since this is an issue that can't just be put on hold, for now I have replaced the anvil gui with chat input.

name: Add support for running /tradeplus reload in console
body: A change I made accidentally removed functionality for running /tradeplus reload in console. This is now restored. :)

name: 1.8 support, trade logging, tab completion
body: This update brings tab completion to full function, adds a long-requested trade logging feature, and fixes some incompatibilities with 1.8 introduced in a recent update.

name: Fix tokenmanager offline mode
body: Trade+ tokenmanager extra will now work with offline mode tokenmanager

name: New material library, fix blocked items
body: This update includes a new method of finding material names between versions. Should fix a number of issues people have been experiencing, including the problem with other player's trade items not showing up.

name: Trade+ 3.26 - Prevent crashes from config missing options
body: This update fixes some crashes that could occur if the configs are missing options.

name: Trade+ 3.25 - Fix allow-trade-in-creative & craftbukkit compatability
body: This update fixes the "allow-trade-in-creative" config option and also fixes a crash with craftbukkit servers due to clickable messages

name: Trade+ 3.23 - Efficiency and debug mode
body:
This update contains some small changes in my code to make it more efficient and stable. I also added a new "debug-mode" option in the config. Setting this to true will enable console messages with information during trades.

If you have experienced item loss with Trade+ recently, I would ask that you enable this debug mode and message me with your log files. I have been unable to reproduce the item loss on my own servers, and so must try to collect more information. Thank you.

name: Trade+ 3.22 - Fixes
body:
- Fixed an exception happening when trade is closed while being spectated
- Fixed conflict with anti-combat log/command and other similar plugins

name: Trade+ 3.21 - Error fix
body: This update fixes an error that resulted in NullPointer Exceptions in certain circumstances.

name: Trade+ 3.20 - Fixes
body:
This release...
  - Uses max stack size of the item instead of 64 (Fixes #29)
  - Adds shift right click support in the trade menu, moving one item between inventories. (Fixes #31)
  - Makes the TradeAcceptEvent cancellable

name: Trade+ 3.16 - Economy extra fix and some cleanup
body:
The economy extra was messed up in the last update, it's now fixed. Also cleaned up some code.

A bigger efficiency update is coming soon.

name: Trade+ 3.15(c) - TokenManager typo fix
body:
I did a stupid and made a minor typo in the code causing the tokenmanager trades to not work properly. I'm gonna update this code to be more clear and concise soon so things like this won't happen.

Thanks for bearing with me, enjoy the new extra. Make an issue if you have any problems or suggestions.

name: Trade+ 3.15 - TokenManager extra
body: This update adds an extra to allow trading of TokenManager tokens.

name: Trade+ 3.14 - Fix interaction trade requests
body: This update fixes the "action" config item which allows players to send a trade request by interacting with another player.

name: Trade+ 3.15(b) - Fix TokenEnchant extra and loading times
body: This update fixes an issue with the TokenManager extra and makes the extras load quicker.

name: Trade+ 3.13 - Fix spectate message
body:
- Fixes #24 (similar issues will instead result in the default message being used rather than a crash)
- Fixes #25 
- Removes a debug message that was left in the previous version by mistake

name: Trade+ 3.12 - Attempt to fix broken material names/ids and more bugfixes
Trade+ 3.11 - Remove cursor items when trade is agreed upon
body: Items will now be moved from the players' cursors to their inventories when they agree to prevent some exploits.

name: Trade+ 3.1 - Fix dupe bug and prettify lang file
Trade+ 3.0 - 1.13 support and bugfixes
body: This is the official release of Trade+ 3.0 for 1.7 up to 1.13.

name: Trade+ 2.57 - Fix placeholders in spectate announcement
Trade+ 2.57-1.13 - Fix placeholders in spectate announcement
Trade+ 2.56 - Bugfixes and configuration options for the staff spectate notification
body: This update fixes a couple bugs and adds to the langfile the options to configure the staff notification for trades.

name: Trade+ 2.56-1.13 - Bugfixes and configuration options for the staff spectate notification
body: This update fixes a couple bugs and adds to the langfile the options to configure the staff notification for trades.

name: Trade+ 2.55 - Small fixes and efficiency updates
Trade+ 2.55-1.13 - BETA 1.13 release
body: Moved some fixes and updates from master to 1.13. Also bumping up from alpha to beta, as this release is now confirmed to be functional. Problems should still be expected, because the 1.13 bukkit/spigot api is not in its final state.

name: Trade+ 2.54 - EXP trading hotfix
body: Should fix #12

name: Trade+ 2.54-1.13 - ALPHA 1.13 release
body:
This is an alpha for 1.13 Trade+. If you use any data ids in the config, you will need to update them to 1.13 or they might not work. For example, `stained_glass_pane:15` would become `black_stained_glass_pane`.

If you run into any problems, please post detailed reports of them here: https://github.com/Trophonix/TradePlus/issues/15

name: Trade+ 2.53 - Permissions fixes
body: This update fixes permission issues in the commands and adds some new permission-related nodes to the lang file.

name: Trade+ 2.52 - TokenEnchant Extra
body: This release adds support for trading TokenEnchant tokens.

name: Trade+ 2.52 Beta - TokenEnchant Extra
body:
This beta release adds support for trading TokenEnchant tokens.

Since I do not have access to TokenEnchant, I'm releasing this as a beta until I can get confirmation that everything works as expected.

name: Trade+ 2.51 - Configurable Aliases
body:
This update allows you to configure aliases for the `/trade` command.

Example aliases:
```yaml
aliases:
  - "trade+"
  - "tradealias2"
```

name: Trade+ 2.50 - EnjinPoints Extra
body:
This release adds support for trading Enjin points! 

**Note:** UI may be a bit slow when adding Enjin points to a trade. This is unfortunately not fixable due to the nature of the Enjin points API.

name: Trade+ 2.48 - Bugfixes
body:
This release contains fixes for a few bugs reported in the last month or so.
- Spectator inventory is closed when the trade ends so spectators can't mess with the items (#1)
- Item blacklist works now (#3)
- Make sure after extra clicks that increments and values can't go below 0 or above max (#4)

name: Trade+ 2.47 - Griefprevention Fix
body: I found the problem with the griefprevention extra that was causing it to not give the player the correct amount of blocks they bought. Sorry for any inconvenience this issue may have caused!

name: Trade+ 2.46 - Permissions fix
body: This is a small update to fix the last update. It was checking for the send permission before it allowed you to do /trade at all rather than only checking for it when you're sending a new request.

name: Split permissionnode into two config options
body:
You can now give permission to send and accept trades separately! An example use case of this is if you only want VIPs to be able to send trade requests but want them to be able to trade with anyone. 

**Changes:**
 - permissionrequired ---> permissions.required (default: false)
 - permissionnode ---> permissions.send (default: tradeplus.send)
 - [new feature] permissions.accept (default: tradeplus.accept)

name: Trade+ 2.43
body: I added some code that helps to support special characters in the new blocked.lore config item and added support for & color codes.

name: Trade+ 2.42
body: Important bug fix from the last update.

name: Trade+ 2.42 (BROKEN)
body:
This version adds:
- Config item **blocked.lore** to block trading of items with certain strings in the display name or lore
- Config item **blocked.regex** to block trading of items of which the display name and/lore lore matches a [Regex Pattern](http://regexr.com)
- Config item **allow-trade-in-creative** to block trading in creative, along with related messages added to the lang.yml (**creative** and **creativethem**)

name: Trade+ 2.41
body: Fixed a bug related to the GriefPrevention extra.

name: Trade+ 2.40
body: Fixed some bugs and re-compiled for 1.12.

name: Trade+ 2.34
body:
This is the first version released through the GitHub releases.

I will try to keep these downloads up-to-date, and they are completely free. If you want to contribute (a sort of "donation") to my future work and/or find a lot of use out of the plugin, I would very much appreciate if you buy it on Spigot: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/23138/

Enjoy :)
